goals.contribution: Apple has initiatives to promote health and well-being through its technology solutions, such as health monitoring features on the Apple Watch that track heart rate, activity, and sleep. Additionally, the Health app encourages users to maintain a healthy lifestyle.

Apple supports quality education through various programs and products, like Apple's Everyone Can Code and Everyone Can Create curriculums. These initiatives aim to empower educators and students with innovative tools and foster creativity and critical thinking.
Apple is investing in renewable energy projects worldwide to power its operations with 100% clean energy. The company also encourages its suppliers to transition to renewable energy.
Apple prioritizes innovation and technology development, fostering industry transformation. It also invests in the infrastructure needed for growth in its technology ecosystems.
Apple focuses on diversity and inclusion within its workforce and partners. It implements programs to support underrepresented communities and provides resources for equitable opportunities.
As part of its commitment to climate action, Apple aims to become carbon neutral across its entire business, manufacturing supply chain, and product life cycle by 2030.
Apple engages in strategic partnerships with organizations and governments to advance its sustainability goals and contribute to achieving the broader SDG agenda.
